home.title: Welcome to Medicalculator
home.description: A comprehensive medical calculator for healthcare professionals. Select a category from the sidebar to explore available formulas.
home.feature1: Evidence-based medical formulas and scoring systems
home.feature2: Support for multiple categories including cardiology, nephrology, and pediatrics
home.selectFromSidebar: Select a Formula from the Sidebar
home.sidebarHint: Use the navigation menu on the left to browse formulas by category

qrcode.title: Export Calculation
qrcode.description: Scan this QR code to transfer the calculation data to your medical records system.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.noFavoritesDescription: Star formulas to add them here!

share.title: Share Calculation
share.description: Copy this URL to share the calculation with input values.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.message: We apologize for the inconvenience. An unexpected error has occurred. Please reload the page or try again.
